Welcome Friends & Family

Rackspace Online Repository

of all things Web

expert. confident. helpful. results-obssesed.

Driven by a culture of achieving, Rackers place a significant value in information sharing and to put it simply... Getting things done. The goal of Project Zoolander is not simply to create a styleguide for ants but to make development and unification of a 6,000+ person company something so much more digestible. With this online tool we strive to inform the masses and uphold the brand values while making all of our lives just a little bit easier.
